Sentencas: In this paper, a variable structure controller for temperature control of the solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) is proposed.
Titulo: Control-Oriented Nonlinear Modeling and Temperature Control for Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: The performance and availability of the SOFC are greatly dependent on its operating temperature.
Titulo: Control-Oriented Nonlinear Modeling and Temperature Control for Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: For high efficiency and low degradation of the fuel cell due to thermal cycling, the fuel cell temperature should remain fairly constant during operation.
Titulo: Control-Oriented Nonlinear Modeling and Temperature Control for Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: To meet the demands of developing valid control strategies, a control-oriented multi-input multi-output nonlinear thermal model of the SOFC is first developed in this paper.
Titulo: Control-Oriented Nonlinear Modeling and Temperature Control for Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: Then, by combining the technique of input-output linearization with variable structure control (VSC) theory, a VSC controller for temperature control is proposed.
Titulo: Control-Oriented Nonlinear Modeling and Temperature Control for Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: Simulation results demonstrate the correctness of the proposed control-oriented nonlinear thermal model, while the excellence of the VSC controller for temperature control in the presence of external disturbance is proved.
Titulo: Control-Oriented Nonlinear Modeling and Temperature Control for Solid Oxide Fuel Cell
